usage:
Syntax: FileLoad <file>
Commands outputs Array of bytes [], which can be used by other commands.
Example: FileLoad "Data\AnsiFont.szp"

Syntax: FileSave <file> <cmd ...>
Save data returned by another command (cmd) to specified file.
Example: FileSave "Data\FST.bin" DumpFst

Syntax: sleep <milliseconds>
Examples of use: sleep 1000

Syntax: echo <text>
Examples of use: echo "Hello, world!"

GetLoaded.help: Get the full path of the loaded file
GetLoaded.info: Used by other components to obtain information about the currently running game or DOL file.

usage:
Syntax: boot <file>
path can be relative
Examples of use: boot c:\luigimansion.gcm
                 boot PONG.dol
